description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) has a requirement for the procurement of new Automatic Identification System (AIS) Physical
full_summary:
### Automatic Identification System (AIS) Physical Shore Station
#### Solicitation Number: F7048-200089/B

The [Public Works and Government Services Canada](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/cbp-p Mane.&.rules_sce.do?programId=A&ttlHM&mPL&ak) invites interested suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of new Automatic Identification System (AIS) Physical Shore Station (PSS) to support the AIS network across Canada.

**Trade Agreement:**
This solicitation is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Strategy:**
A competitive procurement strategy will be used, where all interested suppliers may submit a bid.

**Scope of Requirements:**
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) has a requirement for the procurement of new AIS PSS to support the AIS network across Canada. The requirements include the provision of spares parts, documentation, training, and in-service support.

**Contract Duration:**
The contract will be valid for a period of five (5) years with five (5) additional one-year option periods.

**Geographic Distribution:**
The AIS PSS will be distributed across 28 electronic workshops, which will be supported by the AIS network. The workshops are distributed as follows:

- 2 workshops in the Arctic region
- 6 workshops in the Atlantic North region
- 5 workshops in the Atlantic South region
- 6 workshops in the St. Lawrence River region
- 5 workshops in the Great Lakes region
- 4 workshops in the Pacific region

**Training:**
The CCG has a college located in Sydney, Nova Scotia, for operational and technical training.

**Security:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Tendering Documentation:
The following documents are available on the [Canada.Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca) website:

- English Documents:
  - [ABES.PROD.PW__QF.B128.E28864.EBSU001.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/52a2bd27005856e6c2ffdeeba0afc0d8/ABES.PROD.PW__QF.B128.E28864.EBSU001.PDF)
  - [ABES.PROD.PW__QF.B128.E28864.E
